      • getWorldSizeRatio

        public static float getWorldSizeRatio()
        eg: Target: 800x480 ScreenSize: 1280x720 1280/480 = 6/4 ---------> new width = 480*6/4 = 720;

      • xRatio

        public static float xRatio()
        Get position X ratio to re-position actors (only for DIPactive true) EXAMPLE: if WORLD_TARGET_WIDTH = 480, and we set x position 20 for actor. We designed this for 480 WORLD_WIDTH, but a device with 960 width, WORLD_WIDTH will be 960, so new position should be 40 in this world, so position ratio is 2.0f made:changes
        Returns:

      • yRatio

        public static float yRatio()
        Get position Y ratio to re-position actors (only for DIPactive true)

        EXAMPLE:
        if WORLD_TARGET_HEIGHT = 480, and we set y position 20 for actor. We designed this for 480 WORLD_HEIGHT, but a device with 960 height, WORLD_HEIGHT will be 960, so new position should be 40 in this world, so position ratio is 2.0f made:changes

        Returns:

      • capitalize
